SEARCH
Package src.main.java.arimaa.game

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.arimaa.game.Piece
public class Piece extends Object
Represents a piece in an Arimaa game. Each piece has a type, color, strength, and a square on the board where it is located.

    • push

      public void push(Piece other, Square newSquare, Board board)
      Pushes another piece to a new square on the board. The other piece must be weaker and the new square must be adjacent to the current square of the weaker piece. The stronger piece takes the place of the weaker piece.
      Parameters:
      other - The other piece to push.
      newSquare - The new square to push the other piece to.
      board - The game board.

    • pull

      public void pull(Piece other, Square newSquare, Board board)
      Pulls another piece to a new square on the board. The other piece must be weaker and the new square must be adjacent to the current square of the stronger piece. The weaker piece takes the place of the stronger piece.
      Parameters:
      other - The other piece to pull.
      newSquare - The new square for stronger piece to go to.
      board - The game board.

    • isStronger

      public boolean isStronger(Piece other)
      Checks if the piece is stronger than another piece.
      Parameters:
      other - The other piece to compare with.
      Returns:
      true if this piece is stronger than the other piece, false otherwise.

    • isFrozen

      public boolean isFrozen(Board board)
      Checks if the piece is frozen. A piece is frozen if it is adjacent to a stronger enemy piece and there are no friendly pieces adjacent to it.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board.
      Returns:
      true if the piece is frozen, false otherwise.

    • hasFriendlyAdjacent

      public boolean hasFriendlyAdjacent(Board board)
      Checks if the piece has any friendly pieces adjacent to it.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board.
      Returns:
      true if the piece has any friendly pieces adjacent to it, false otherwise.

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove(Square newSquare, Board board)
      Checks if the piece can move to a new square. The new square must be adjacent to the current square of the piece and must be empty.
      Parameters:
      newSquare - The new square to move the piece to.
      board - The game board.
      Returns:
      true if the piece can move to the new square, false otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the piece.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the piece.
